contentrichtext.text: '''Mount Holly''' is the name of several places ;in the United States (by state) *[[Mount Holly Cemetery]], Little Rock, AR, listed on the NRHP in Arkansas **[[Mount Holly Mausoleum]], Little Rock, AR, listed on the NRHP in Arkansas *[[Mount Holly Ski Area]], [[Holly, Michigan]] *[[Mount Holly (Foote, Mississippi)]], [[List of RHPs in MS|listed on the NRHP in Mississippi]] *[[Mount Holly Township, New Jersey]] **[[Mount Holly Historic District]], Mount Holly, NJ, listed on the NRHP in New Jersey *[[Mount Holly, North Carolina]] **[[Mount Holly Cotton Mill]], Mount Holly, NC, [[List of RHPs in NC|listed on the NRHP in North Carolina]] *[[Mount Holly, Vermont]] ==See also== *[[Holly (disambiguation)]] {{geodis}}
